name: V_EHI_PAX_PB_ACCT_TX_PMT_TX
description: This view filters out premium billing transaction data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium account transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter of the payment on the transaction.

columns.name: HIST_PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium account transaction used as a payment against this premium account transaction.

columns.name: PMT_AMT
columns.description: Amount of the payment transaction applied towards this premium account transaction.

columns.name: REMAINING_AMT
columns.description: Amount remaining on the premium account transaction after the payment has been applied.

columns.name: PAYMENT_REV_LINE
columns.description: Specifies the payment history reversed line.
